Insights:
- The departure of Sam Altman as CEO of OpenAI has caused shock and speculation in the tech world.
- Mira Murati has been appointed as the interim CEO of OpenAI.
- Wiley has sold its OPM business, and there are increased funding requests being weighed by the state school board.
- Ransomware attacks and SEC complaints are putting pressure on companies like Wiley Rein.
- There is a mix of news articles, obituaries, and sports updates in the provided content.
- The scale of the crisis in Gaza is evident through satellite photos.
- US stocks have seen consecutive weeks of gains.
- Chefs are able to feed a large number of fans at America's biggest football stadium.
